title: Kubernetes Chaos
description: Chaos Engineering is the discipline of experimenting on a system in order to build confidence in the system’s capability to withstand turbulent conditions in production.

courses.title: KubeInvaders
courses.description: Destroy Pods as if they were aliens.

courses.title: Kube Monkey
courses.description: Randomly delete Kubernetes Pods to encourage development of failure-resilient services.

courses.title: Chaoskube
courses.description: Periodically kills random pods in your Kubernetes cluster.

courses.title: Chaos Mesh
courses.description: Применение облачной chaos engineering к вашим приложениям с помощью Chaos Mesh.

courses.title: Istio 1.7.3 начало работы
courses.description: Знакомство с Istio с приложением BookInfo.
